name: 1921: Shadow of the Old World
storyline: Year 1921. Former Russian Empire is torn apart by two opposing factions - Bolsheviks and Monarchist White Movement. The Soviets are winning, any battle actions seems pointless now. The land is in ruins, people are starving. Some dirty arms dealer named Srilenko is trying to reignite this bloody conflict and end up rich! You are a secret agent with nearly impossible mission to stop this maniac and save millions of people!
summary: A spiritual successor to the 3D game called "Old World", set in Russian Civil War (1917-1922).
